reviews.review:
This is what love and respect for a franchise and their fan can bring.
This is an amazingly well crafted movie with the mother of a cliffhanger that brought what was a cheering theater to total shock.

at the end, no one was clapping ( I never saw that on a premiere night) but everyone stayed in their seats till the last moment of the generic. From what I heard all around me, We where all on the same page: we where as devastated as we loved the movie.. 

and that is an awful lot girl!
Pure spectacle. Relentless action movie featuring familiar characters. Solid effects and acting.Story that hangs together and provides many surprises.
One of the best Marvel Studios movies for ever!

One of the greatest spectacular superhero combo movie of all time gives you a complete package of entertainment .You will meet the strongest but also emotional super villain in the history of MCU.You are gonna hate him and so do love him.Since there are so many characters in the movie we often get confused where to look around.The writers  have managed them quiet good and some of our beloved characters deserved more.You will get to see some unexpected and amazing moments which you have never experienced in any other superhero films."This was only the way" the words from doctor strange may give you the answer for the lose we face.Cant wait until 2019 to see the Return of THANOS.Anyway at last I will say this is power packed movie with lot of emotions,funny moments ,action which will completely entertain you.
Holy cow did I love this movie excellent movie
The movie was great but I hated the amount of jokes in the movie. There was a joke every 5 seconds which ruined the movie for me.

Felt like two movies that were put into one. The movie with Ironman and spiderman was brilliant. The other movie was pretty eh. To accurately describe this movie my girl friend fell asleep and the guy sitting next to me was extremely emotional the entire time.
A visual treat, jokes, action on point. Take notes DC
The ending left me speechless and sullen, but the heroes that died did so fighting to the end, because that's what heroes do.  Well worth the price of admission and definitely re-watchable.
